text: Kuma Muka fitar da abin da yake a cikin ƙirãzansu, daga ƙiyayya, ƙõramu sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, kuma suka ce: "Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah, wanda Ya shiryar da mu ga wannan. Kuma ba mu kasance munã iya shiryuwa ba, bã dõmin Allah Ya shiryar da mu ba. Lalle ne haƙĩƙa, Manzannin Ubangjinmu, sun jẽ mana da gaskiya."
